key.name: utf8-for-spam-filter
key.description: Convert message text to Unicode UTF-8 to unify spam/ham tokens coming from different character sets.

key.name: command
key.summary: Full path command to run Bogofilter
key.description: Full path to a Bogofilter command. If not set, then a compile-time path is used, usually /usr/bin/bogofilter. The command should not contain any other arguments.
